title: Bloodthrone Vampire sacks itself for 0 value
content:
_From [firat.al...@googlemail.com](https://code.google.com/u/112109140426664196609/) on September 08, 2012 19:38:45_

What steps will reproduce the problem? 1. AI (MCTS-C 6) plays Bloodthrone Vampire (Sac a creature: BVamp gets +2/+2 until EOT)

AI sacs the Vampire to itself, effectively just killing it's own creature for no benefit at all. Is this just a Bug due to the AI's general random strategy (i.e. not using domain knowledge), simulating moves at random?
